SEARCH
Package net.tangly.ui.components

Class GridMenu<T>

java.lang.Object
net.tangly.ui.components.GridMenu<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of the items in the grid
public class GridMenu<T> extends Object
Defines a grid menu abstraction to support a dynamic context menu in item views. Menu items can be enabled or disabled based on the fact if items are seleected or not.

    • buildCrudMenu

      public void buildCrudMenu(@NotNull @NotNull Mode mode, net.tangly.commons.lang.functional.LazyReference<ItemForm<T,?>> form)
      Creates the standard CRUD menu for an item view. The menu is built based on the mode of the grid.
      Parameters:
      mode - mode of the grid
      form - optional form to display the item. If the form has the LIST mode, no form is displayed.
